statements: SELECT * FROM impact_assessment;
SELECT assessment_id, privacy_risks FROM impact_assessment;
SELECT data_collected, storage_duration FROM impact_assessment;
SELECT * FROM impact_assessment WHERE data_collected = 'Sensitive Data';
SELECT * FROM impact_assessment ORDER BY storage_duration DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, data_collected, storage_duration, privacy_risks FROM impact_assessment WHERE assessment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT assessment_id, data_collected FROM impact_assessment WHERE data_collected LIKE '%PII%';
SELECT * FROM impact_assessment WHERE storage_duration > INTERVAL '30 days';
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(DAY FROM storage_duration)) AS avg_duration_days FROM impact_assessment;
SELECT assessment_id, privacy_risks FROM impact_assessment ORDER BY privacy_risks DESC;
SELECT * FROM impact_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
SELECT assessment_id, privacy_risk_evaluation FROM impact_assessment WHERE assessment_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT data_type, storage_capacity FROM data_storage WHERE storage_location = 'MainServer';
SELECT * FROM impact_assessment WHERE privacy_risk_evaluation = 'High' AND assessment_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT assessment_id, data_collection_method FROM impact_assessment WHERE data_collection_method IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM impact_assessment WHERE assessment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT assessment_id, data_collection_method FROM impact_assessment WHERE privacy_risk_evaluation = 'High' ORDER BY assessment_id DESC;
SELECT storage_location, data_type FROM data_storage WHERE storage_capacity > 1000;
SELECT assessment_id, data_collection_method FROM impact_assessment WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM impact_assessment IA INNER JOIN data_storage DS ON IA.assessment_id = DS.storage_id;
SELECT * FROM impact_assessment;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM impact_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM privacy_risks WHERE risk_rating > 3;
SELECT risk_name, risk_rating FROM privacy_risks WHERE risk_description LIKE '%sensitive%';
SELECT storage_location, storage_capacity FROM data_storage WHERE storage_type = 'Cloud';
SELECT * FROM impact_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT risk_name, risk_description FROM privacy_risks WHERE risk_rating > 3;
SELECT id, assessment_name FROM impact_assessment WHERE data_collection_method = 'Survey';
SELECT risk_name, risk_rating FROM privacy_risks WHERE risk_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY risk_rating ASC;
SELECT storage_type, storage_capacity, storage_location FROM data_storage WHERE storage_capacity >= 100 ORDER BY storage_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM impact_assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, data_collection_method, assessment_date FROM impact_assessments;
SELECT collector_id, collector_name FROM data_collectors WHERE collector_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT source_name, data_type FROM data_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, data_source_id, risk_score FROM assessment_results WHERE risk_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM impact_assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, data_collection_method FROM impact_assessments WHERE privacy_risk_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM data_collectors WHERE collector_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, risk_score FROM impact_assessments JOIN assessment_results ON impact_assessments.assessment_id = assessment_results.assessment_id;
SELECT source_name, data_type FROM data_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM impact_assessment;
SELECT name, description FROM impact_assessment WHERE date_conducted > '2022-01-01';
SELECT storage_location, storage_capacity FROM data_storage WHERE encryption_method = 'AES-256';
SELECT * FROM privacy_risks ORDER BY likelihood_of_risk DESC, impact_level ASC;
SELECT assessment_id, risk_id, risk_score FROM assessment_results WHERE risk_score >= 70;
SELECT * FROM assessment_results WHERE risk_score > 70;
SELECT risk_description, likelihood_of_risk FROM privacy_risks WHERE likelihood_of_risk >= 3 ORDER BY likelihood_of_risk DESC;
SELECT id, storage_location, storage_capacity FROM data_storage WHERE storage_capacity IS NOT NULL;
SELECT assessment_id, risk_id, risk_score FROM assessment_results WHERE assessment_id IN (SELECT id FROM impact_assessment WHERE date_conducted > '2022-01-01');
SELECT name, description FROM impact_assessment WHERE id = (SELECT assessment_id FROM assessment_results WHERE risk_id = 2);
